metric_001.title: Percentage of Issues Not Responded Within One Cycle
metric_001.desc: The percentage of newly created Issues in the current cycle that have not been responded to within one cycle, excluding bots and creator comments

metric_002.title: Issue First Response Time
metric_002.desc: First response time for newly created Issues within the cycle, excluding bots and creator comments

metric_003.title: Issue Processing Duration
metric_003.desc: Average Issue processing duration (days), including closed Issues and unresolved Issues

metric_004.title: Percentage of PRs Not Responded Within One Cycle
metric_004.desc: The percentage of newly created PRs in the current cycle that have not been responded to within one cycle

metric_005.title: PR First Response Time
metric_005.desc: First response time for newly created PRs within the cycle, excluding bots and creator comments

metric_006.title: PR Processing Duration
metric_006.desc: Average duration from PR creation to merge or close

metric_007.title: Code Submission via PR Ratio
metric_007.desc: The percentage of code submitted via PR within the cycle

metric_008.title: PR Linked to Issue Ratio
metric_008.desc: The percentage of PRs linked to Issues within the cycle

metric_009.title: Review Collaboration Ratio
metric_009.desc: The percentage of PRs with at least one non-author Review comment or Approval record within the cycle

metric_010.title: Merge Collaboration Ratio
metric_010.desc: The percentage of PRs where the merger is different from the PR author within the cycle

metric_011.title: PR Comment Frequency
metric_011.desc: Average number of comments/conversations per PR

metric_012.title: Review Time by Pull Request Size
metric_012.desc: Average review time grouped by code change lines (XS/S/M/L/XL)

metric_013.title: Community Contributor Count
metric_013.desc: Number of unique users with any contribution behavior within the cycle

metric_014.title: Code Contributor Count
metric_014.desc: Number of unique users with code commits, PR merges, or PR comments within the cycle

metric_015.title: Non-Code Contributor Count
metric_015.desc: Number of users who only participated in discussions without submitting code within the cycle

metric_016.title: Code Commit Count
metric_016.desc: Total number of new Commits within the cycle

metric_017.title: Lines of Code Added
metric_017.desc: Total code line changes within the cycle

metric_018.title: PR Comment Count
metric_018.desc: Total number of comments under all Issues and PRs within the cycle

metric_019.title: Issue Creation Count
metric_019.desc: Total number of Issues created within the cycle

metric_020.title: Issue Comment Count
metric_020.desc: Total number of comments under Issues within the cycle

metric_021.title: Version Iteration Count
metric_021.desc: Number of Releases published within the cycle

metric_022.title: Stars
metric_022.desc: Number of new Stars within the cycle

metric_023.title: Forks
metric_023.desc: Number of new Forks within the cycle

metric_024.title: Social Media Mentions
metric_024.desc: Mentions on social media platforms such as Twitter/X, Reddit, Hacker News, etc.

metric_025.title: GitHub Mentions
metric_025.desc: Mentions of the project repository in Issues, PRs, and README files on GitHub among TOP 500k projects

metric_026.title: Media Coverage
metric_026.desc: Number of times the project is mentioned in online news media, blogs, and tech media

metric_027.title: Search Query Volume
metric_027.desc: Query volume for the project in search engines

metric_028.title: Commercial Organization Count
metric_028.desc: Number of unique commercial companies identified through contributor email domains or user profiles within the cycle

metric_029.title: Commercial Organization Contributor Count
metric_029.desc: Number of active developers affiliated with commercial organizations (non-personal email) within the cycle

metric_030.title: Research Institution Count
metric_030.desc: Number of research institution organizations participating in contributions within the cycle

metric_031.title: Research Institution Developer Count
metric_031.desc: Number of contributors from research institution organizations participating in code contributions within the cycle

metric_032.title: Individual Core Contributor Count
metric_032.desc: Individual contributors whose code contributions exceed 50% of their total contributions are core contributors, those below 50% are regular contributors

metric_033.title: Commercial Organization Ecosystem Influence
metric_033.desc: Influence of contributing commercial organizations in the ecosystem

metric_034.title: Research Institution Ecosystem Influence
metric_034.desc: Influence of contributing research institutions in the ecosystem

metric_035.title: Individual Contributor Ecosystem Influence
metric_035.desc: Influence of contributing individual contributors in the ecosystem

metric_036.title: Software Package Downloads
metric_036.desc: Number of open source software downloads

metric_037.title: Open Source Software Adoption
metric_037.desc: Number of references by other open source projects (TOP 500k)

metric_038.title: Commercial Software Adoption
metric_038.desc: Number of mainstream commercial products/services based on this project

metric_040.title: Organization Count
metric_040.desc: Number of organizations participating in contributions within the cycle

metric_041.title: Organization Code Contributors
metric_041.desc: Number of organization contributors participating in code contributions within the cycle

metric_042.title: Organization Code Contributor Ratio
metric_042.desc: Ratio of organization contributors participating in code contributions to total code contributors within the cycle

metric_043.title: Organization Code Contribution Volume
metric_043.desc: Lines of code contributed by organizations within the cycle

metric_044.title: Organization Code Contribution Ratio
metric_044.desc: Ratio of code contributed by organizations to total code within the cycle

metric_045.title: Organization Non-Code Contributors
metric_045.desc: Number of organization contributors participating in non-code contributions within the cycle

metric_046.title: Organization Non-Code Contributor Ratio
metric_046.desc: Ratio of organization non-code contributors to total non-code contributors within the cycle

metric_047.title: Organization Non-Code Contribution Volume
metric_047.desc: Non-code contribution volume by organizations within the cycle

metric_048.title: Organization Non-Code Contribution Ratio
metric_048.desc: Ratio of organization non-code contributions to total non-code contributions within the cycle

metric_049.title: Organizations Participating in Governance
metric_049.desc: Number of unique organizations from non-founding organizations in community governance roles within the cycle

metric_050.title: Organization Manager Count
metric_050.desc: Number of unique managers from non-founding organizations in community governance roles within the cycle

metric_051.title: Organization Manager Ratio
metric_051.desc: Ratio of managers from organizations (non-individual) in community governance roles to total managers within the cycle

metric_052.title: Individual Code Contributors
metric_052.desc: Number of individual (non-organizational) contributors with code contribution behavior (such as code commits, PRs) within the cycle

metric_053.title: Individual Code Contributor Ratio
metric_053.desc: Ratio of individual code contributors to total code contributors within the cycle

metric_054.title: Individual Code Contribution Volume
metric_054.desc: Lines of code submitted by individual contributors within the cycle

metric_055.title: Individual Code Contribution Ratio
metric_055.desc: Ratio of code lines contributed by individuals to total code contribution lines within the cycle

metric_056.title: Individual Non-Code Contributors
metric_056.desc: Number of individual (non-organizational) contributors who only participated in non-code contribution behaviors (such as Issue/PR comments, documentation) within the cycle

metric_057.title: Individual Non-Code Contributor Ratio
metric_057.desc: Ratio of individual non-code contributors to total non-code contributors within the cycle

metric_058.title: Individual Non-Code Contribution Volume
metric_058.desc: Total non-code contributions submitted by individual contributors within the cycle (such as Issue/PR comment count)

metric_059.title: Individual Non-Code Contribution Ratio
metric_059.desc: Ratio of individual non-code contributions to total non-code contributions within the cycle

metric_060.title: Individual Manager Count
metric_060.desc: Number of unique individual managers in community governance roles within the cycle

metric_061.title: Individual Manager Ratio
metric_061.desc: Ratio of individual managers in community governance roles to total managers within the cycle

metric_062.title: Contributor Statistics
metric_062.desc: Display contributor details, including contributor count, top contributor, contributing organization count, top contributing organization, as well as each contributor's role persona, milestone persona, domain persona, organization affiliation and contribution volume

metric_063.title: Issue Management
metric_063.desc: Display Issue management details, including new Issue count, Issue resolution rate, unresponded Issue count, average comment count, as well as each Issue's status, processing duration, comment count and other information

metric_064.title: PR Management
metric_064.desc: Display PR management details, including new PR count, PR resolution rate, unresponded PR count, code commit count, as well as each PR's status, processing duration, reviewers and other information
